models.name: Gemini 3 Flash
models.description: Highest quality text model. Use for complex reasoning, multi-step tasks, long context understanding, and when output quality matters most.

models.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
models.description: Strong general-purpose text model. Use for assistants, summaries, planning, and reliable reasoning with good performance.

models.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite
models.description: Fast and cost-efficient text model. Use for short responses, simple logic, classification, and high-volume requests.

models.name: Gemma 3 27B
models.description: Large open-weight model with solid language understanding. Use when Gemini models are unavailable or open models are required.

models.name: Gemma 3 12B
models.description: Mid-size open model. Use for basic chat, summaries, and content generation without complex reasoning.

models.name: Gemma 3 4B
models.description: Lightweight model for simple text generation and formatting tasks. Avoid complex or multi-step reasoning.

models.name: Gemma 3 2B
models.description: Very basic text model. Use only for trivial transformations, tagging, or keyword-based tasks.

models.name: Gemma 3 1B
models.description: Lowest-capability model. Use only as a fallback for extremely simple or constrained workloads.
